title: Strengthening CS (Customer Service) Practical Competencies: Participatory Childbirth Preparation Workshops for Mothers and Spouses

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Participants can explain physiological changes during each stage of childbirth with 80% accuracy.
Participants can create personalized birth plans using mathematical decision-making models.
Participants can identify over 70% of childbirth-related risk factors based on statistical data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
